translation.title: Fear of the Bad Place, the Underworld

segments.en: 15. Fear of the Bad Place, the Underworld

segments.pli: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaduggativinipātabhayaṃ samatikkanto hoti.
segments.en: “Mendicants, a noble disciple who has four things has gone beyond all fear of being reborn in a bad place, the underworld.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
segments.en: It’s when a noble disciple has experiential confidence in the Buddha …

segments.pli: itipi so bhagavā … pe … satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavāti.
ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi … pe … samādhisaṃvattanikehi.
segments.en: And they have the ethical conduct loved by the noble ones … leading to immersion.

segments.pli: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sabbaduggativinipātabhayaṃ samatikkanto hotī”ti.
segments.en: A noble disciple who has these four things has gone beyond all fear of being reborn in a bad place, the underworld.”
